# --- Settings ---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
plot_save <- FALSE
```


# --- Packages ---

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

```


# --- Data ---

# 1. create data

```{r}
# make vector of possible incomes
money <- seq(0, 1e6, 1e3)

# turn into data frame
df_util <- data.frame(money)

# show df
df_util

```

# --- Analysis ---

# 1. graph

```{r}
df_util %>% 
  mutate(util_1 = log(money)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = money,
             y = util_1)) +
  geom_line()

```
